attributes.additional_details: This petition is being created so we, the people of Britain, can decide right now if we should leave the EU or not. 2017 is to late and in that time, immigrants will flood our small island in a desperate attempt to gain citizenship before we inevitably vote to leave the EU. The EU is also strangling our economy with ridiculous rules and this needs to be stopped. They demand payments but i never see any of the money our government sends, charity starts at home!
